Reading.Description: In the Reading test, you will read a variety of texts and answer several different types of reading comprehension questions. The entire Reading test will last 75 minutes. There are three parts, and directions are given for each part. You are encouraged to answer as many questions as possible within the time allowed.

Part-list.Part: Directions: A word or phrase is missing in each of the sentences below. Four answer choices are given below each sentence. Select the best answer to complete the sentence. Then mark the letter (A), (B), (C), or (D) on your answer sheet.

Directions: Read the texts that follow. A word or phrase is missing in some of the sentences. Four answer choices are given below each of the sentences. Select the best answer to complete the text. Then mark the letter (A), (B), (C), or (D) on your answer sheet.

Directions: In this part you will read a selection of texts, such as magazine and newspaper articles, letters, and advertisements. Each text is followed by several questions. Select the best answer for each question and mark the letter (A), (B), (C), or (D) on your answer sheet.

Question.content: Register early if you would like to attend next Tuesday’s ....... on project management.
Paul Brown resigned last Monday from his position as ....... executive of the company.
The financial audit of Soft Peach Software ....... completed on Wednesday by a certified accounting firm.
The organizers of the trip reminded participants to ....... at the steps of the city hall at 2:00 P.M.
------- is no better season than winter to begin training at Silver’s Fitness Center.
The recent worldwide increase in oil prices has led to a ....... demand for electric vehicles.
Maria Vásquez has a wide range of experience, ....... worked in technical, production, and marketing positions.
Tickets will not be redeemable for cash or credit at any time, ....... will they be replaced if lost or stolen.
Author Ken Yabuki wrote a magazine article based on -------- recent visit to Iceland.
To ....... the Adele's Apparel store that is nearest to you, select your state or country from the pull-down menu.
The ink cartridge is designed for the SZ2000 laser printer -------- should not be used with any other model.
Lonan Imports will work -------- with any distributor to fullfill a customer request.
Products made by Izmir Vitamins are designed to promote --------- and well-being.
-------- graduating from Laccord University, Jing Xiong worked for Osiris Financial Service.
Gyeong Designs recently changed its marketing strategy to target hotel and restaurant -------
Ulrich Electronics will provide free ....... of any entertainment system purchased by June 30.
Jane Turngate was elected chairperson of ther board of directors at Stellmann Corporation by a ....... margin
The Keenview television is ....... selling well, even though the advertising campaign just started.
Today, Wichner Industries announced that it ....... opening an office in Kuala Lumpur to coordinate its overseas operations.
This is a -------- to renew your Chamber of Business membership, which expires on August 30.
Grove Canoes' price may ....... vary depending on changes in the cost of raw materials.

Choices.B: We hope that you will strongly consider joining us.

Choices.D: This is the first in a series of such lectures.

Question.content: Tell us something about your ....... in the engineering industry?
I see from your ....... form that you have had three different jobs in the last 5 years.
What sort of ....... of time would you stay with us if we offered you the job?
Describe how you would describe ....... in five years' time.
Give us some idea of what you believe are your ....... and weaknesses.
As this is a managerial post, we must ask you how you deal with bad ....... keeping or unpunctuality in an employee.
Imagine one of your staff loses her temper and shouts at you in front of others, how would you ....... with this?
What would you say to a member of your staff who always ....... his work in late?
I should explain that we would naturally ....... any previous holiday arrangements you have made.
Finally now that we've asked you several questions, do you want to ....... any to us?
If you drive faster than the stated speed limit, you are simply ....... the law.
However angry you may get at what someone has done to you, the police always advise you not to take the law into your own ........
In London in any underground station it is ....... the law to smoke.
Even if you think you may have got away with a crime, in most cases the long ....... of the law will catch you.
In that particular industry everyone has to look after themselves because the law of the ....... rules.
They have no respect for modern conventions and do exactly what they want — they are a law ....... themselves
Her parents are very strict and frequently ....... down the law about the way she behaves.
Although technically his judgement was not according to the ....... of the law, most people thought the judgeprintwas right to let the man go free.
I get the impression sometimes that she thinks she can never do anything wrong almost as if she is ....... the law
All governments want people to live in peace and comfort and so they try to promote a sense of law and ........
Her latest film ....... its object in a very short space of time, which was to shock.

Question.content: The stock market has hit new ....... this year.
The government has decided to hold an ....... into the latest financial scandal.
The animal rights organisation has ....... a new campaign to make people aware of cruelty to animals
I was totally ....... of the increased taxes.
The price of petrol has ....... again.
The ordinary person is again being asked to ....... to pay for dental treatment.
This car is intended for the ....... market only.
Credit card holders struggle very hard to ....... the amount they owe
This charity was set up to ....... money for the poor.
Everything ....... all right in the end
We're paying for a stand at the new industrial exhibition with a view to ....... interest among potential employees in our company.
For the first three months of your employment with the firm you will be under the care of a ........
Although she was very tempted to accept the job she was offered, she had to ....... the offer because the salary would have been insufficient
A university education is of course important but it is essential that all employees undergo a period of intensive .......
A newsletter is sent out every ten days to all the staff so that they receive a regular ....... on recent appointments
Part of the ongoing training is to ensure that a regular time and place are ....... for department heads to meet their staff
The head of department acknowledged that the ....... of the section was largely due to high quality support staff.
The pace of change in that industry is so fast that staff find it hard to ....... the latest developments
It is the policy of the company to ....... all interviews for new recruits with a member of the trade union present
In view of the excessive workload you have at the moment I won't expect you to keep ....... during the next few days
The film was the first to show conditions in which poor people lived and as such was to ....... future directors

Question.content: It's a gamble at the moment whether the company will make profit in its second year but that nevertheless is the ....... aim
Each year the Chancellor of the Exchequer stands up in the House of Commons and gives a ....... of what is seen as the economic outlook for the country.
I think that your financial optimism is not really justified and you should adopt a more ....... attitude
If you want to increase sales of a particular product, you must be sure that you are ....... the right customers.
The idea caught on very quickly and people were queuing up to buy the goods so that year the company's investment ....... substantial profits
....... it has not been a bad year as our costs are well down on last year's
Managers complained bitterly at the Annual General Meeting that ....... of production had dropped to an all time low.
You have to accept that this kind of expenditure is quite ....... in an enterprise of this kind
The figures that have just been published by the company's accountants will give management some kind of ....... on how sales are going
Whenever a member of staff makes a claim for travel expenses, they have to provide a ....... account of their journeys.
The one big fear of all world economies is that of ........
You are never too young to start ....... some money in a savings account.
If ever you find you have an unexpected expense, you can always ....... some money from your savings.
At certain times of the year your shares will ....... a good profit but you must also be prepared for them to go down in value.
You can ....... the cost of insuring your car if you keep it in a garage
We got a very good ....... when we bought that three piece suite for half its usual price
Now that the summer has started, big department stores are hoping that sales of holiday items will ........
The two companies have decided to ....... because they believe that their combined resources will produce greater profits
When someone dies and their ....... reach a certain figure, their family has to pay an additional tax.
The loan you have taken out is for a ....... term, which in your case is 5 years
The fans outside the cinema on the first showing of the film were unwilling to ....... until all the stars had gone home.

Question.content: You can be absolutely sure I'm on your ........
You can ....... on me for your support
Our views clearly ....... at this point I'm pleased to say.
Fortunately the leader and all her members were singing from the same ....... sheet.
It's good that we both have the same way of ....... at things.
I'm pleased to say that we speak on this matter with one ........
I certainly won't ....... any objection when you make your proposal.
I'm ....... you all the way as far as that's concerned
I'm happy to ....... those sentiments and wish you every success
When it comes to the vote I'm willing to put my ....... up and support you.
Please ....... me for interrupting you, I didn't realize you were busy with someone else
I'm very ....... that I'm late but there is a train strike on at the moment.
Please send my ....... to the meeting as I shan't be able to attend.
There's really no ....... for my behaviour last night. I can only think that I'd had too much to drink.
I know I shouldn't have made those remarks about your work and I hope you now know how deeply I ....... what I said.
I must ....... your pardon, I mistook you for somebody else
If it helps to put things right, please let me take ....... everything I said earlier.
Please accept this small present as my way of making ....... for all the trouble I've caused.
All I can do now is simply beg your ....... and hope that in time we can get back to where we used to be
In their religion as long as they ......., they will be forgiven their sins.
I really think we should talk about the subject we wanted to in the first place and ....... the issue.
